display.name: Realtime SQL Monitor & Execute Plan
display.description: Displays the SQL statements that are automatically monitored by Oracle, when sql statement is to be performed in parallel or when CPU or I/O Time to be consumed more than 5 seconds,

query.sql: select vsm.status "STATUS" ,vsm.sql_id "SQL_ID" ,vs.child_number "CHILD_NUMBER" ,to_char(vsm.sql_exec_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "START_TIME" ,ROUND((vsm.elapsed_time/1000/1000),2) "ELAPSED_TIME(sec)" ,to_char(vsm.last_refresh_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "LAST_REFRESH_TIME" ,vsm.module "MODULE" ,vs.sql_fulltext "SQL_FULLTEXT" ,ROUND((vsm.cpu_time/1000/1000),2) "CPU TIME(sec)" ,vsm.fetches "FETCHES" ,vsm.buffer_gets "BUFFER_GETS" ,vsm.disk_reads "DISK_READS" ,vsm.physical_read_requests "PHYSICAL_READ_REQUESTS" ,ROUND((vsm.physical_read_bytes/1024/1024),2) "PHYSICAL_READ_BYTES(MB)" ,ROUND((vsm.user_io_wait_time/1000/1000),2) "USER_IO_WAIT_TIME(sec)" ,ROUND((vsm.plsql_exec_time/1000/1000),2) "PLSQL_EXEC_TIME(sec)" ,vsm.sid "SID" ,vsm.session_serial# "SERIAL#" ,vsm.sql_plan_hash_value "PLAN_HASH" from v$sql_monitor vsm, v$sql vs where vsm.sql_id = vs.sql_id and vsm.sql_child_address = vs.child_address order by start_time

display.name: Execute Plan
display.description: Obtained from the V$SQL_PLAN individual SQL execution plan obtained in real-time SQL monitoring

query.sql: select id , lpad(' ',depth) || operation operation , options , object_name , optimizer , cost , cpu_cost , io_cost , bytes from v$sql_plan where sql_id = :SQL_ID AND child_number = :CHILD_NUMBER start with id = 0 connect by (prior id = parent_id and prior sql_id = sql_id and prior child_number = child_number ) order siblings by id, position
